item_name: SONY MHC-M60D High Power Audio System with DVD
item_desc:
--- PENGIRIMAN HARUS MENGGUNAKAN GOSEND/GRAB INSTANT UNTUK WILAYAH JADETABEK ---
--- PEMBELIAN MINIMAL 3 UNIT BISA MENGGUNAKAN KURIR TOKO / CUSTOM LOGISTIK ---
--- HARAP KONFIRMASI STOK DAN WILAYAH PENGIRIMAN TERLEBIH DAHULU ---

--- FREE GIFT 1 PC MIC SOUNDCREST SC-178 SETIAP PEMBELIAN SOUND SYSTEM SONY TIPE TERTENTU SELAMA PERSEDIAAN MASIH ADA ---

Pump up the house party
Make your next party the talk of the town. The MHC-M60D brings brighter lights and louder music to your living room to create an authentic club-vibe.

Lose yourself in the lights
The MHC-M60D'''s speaker lights pulse to the music. Take full control of them through the system or from the palm of your hand with the Fiestable app.

Boost the party with extra speakers
Enjoy more powerful sound by connecting multiple home audio systems via Bluetooth". Connect up to 50 compatible home audio systems and synchronise the music and lighting.

Run everything from the dancefloor
The Sony | Music Center app lets you control music and sound settings right from your phone. The Fiestable app lets you activate DJ and karaoke modes. Make changes with a flick of your wrist, thanks to intuitive motion control.

Built-in DVD player for film lovers
Watch movies easily thanks to a built-in DVD player and enjoy rich sound that brings your favourite scenes to life. Connecting your TV is simple ''" all you need is an HDMI cable.

Fitur kunci
- Set off the atmosphere with speaker lights
- Karaoke and guitar inputs let you sing and play along
- Control DJ effects with the Fiestable app
- Integrated DVD player with HDMI out
- Football mode

Spesifikasi
- CD : Yes
- DVD : Yes
- USB1 : Yes
- FM :Yes
- AUDIO IN1 : Yes
- TV : Yes (HDMI), (AUDIO IN)
- BLUETOOTH :Yes(iAP over BT)
- MAIN UNIT DIMENSIONS (WXHXDCM)(APPROX.) : 33.5 x 17.2 x 31.0 ( 3.8kg )
- FRONT SPEAKER DIMENSIONS (WXHXDCM)(APPROX.) : 28.5 x 40.5 x 31.0 ( 7.2 kg)

--- Proses Order dan operasional hari Senin-Jumat jam 09:00 sampai dengan 15:00 dan hari Sabtu 09:00 sampai dengan 13:00, Minggu dan tanggal merah kami OFF ---
